aboutLocales.zh:
关于 CodexFlow

CodexFlow 诞生于一个简单的想法：让 Codex 的使用体验更流畅、更优雅。
aboutLocales.en:
About CodexFlow

CodexFlow began with a simple idea: make interacting with Codex smoother and more elegant.

latest.notes:
## CodexFlow v0.3.0

**亮点**

* 输入框支持展开为全屏编辑，提升输入效率
* 新增暗色主题，提供更舒适的浏览体验
* 历史详情页面每个模块均提供“复制”按钮，便于快速复制内容
* 支持自定义终端字体，满足个性化显示需求
* 优化内存泄漏问题
* 支持选择项目排序顺序，便于快速定位和访问常用项目

**下载（Windows x64 便携版）**

* CodexFlow-v0.3.0-win-x64-portable.zip
* CodexFlow-v0.3.0-win-x64-portable.7z

**快速开始**

https://github.com/lulu-sk/CodexFlow/blob/master/README.zh-CN.md#-%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%9F%E5%BC%80%E5%A7%8B

notesLocales.zh:
## CodexFlow v0.3.0

**亮点**

* 输入框支持展开为全屏编辑，提升输入效率
* 新增暗色主题，提供更舒适的浏览体验
* 历史详情页面每个模块均提供“复制”按钮，便于快速复制内容
* 支持自定义终端字体，满足个性化显示需求
* 优化内存泄漏问题
* 支持选择项目排序顺序，便于快速定位和访问常用项目

**下载（Windows x64 便携版）**

* CodexFlow-v0.3.0-win-x64-portable.zip
* CodexFlow-v0.3.0-win-x64-portable.7z

**快速开始**

https://github.com/lulu-sk/CodexFlow/blob/master/README.zh-CN.md#-%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%9F%E5%BC%80%E5%A7%8B
notesLocales.en:
## CodexFlow v0.3.0

**Highlights**

* Input box now supports full-screen editing, improving input efficiency
* New dark theme added to reduce visual fatigue and provide a more comfortable browsing experience
* Each module on the history details page now has a “Copy” button for quickly copying content
* Custom terminal fonts supported to meet personalized display preferences
* Optimized memory leak issues
* Supports sorting projects to quickly locate and access frequently used items

**Download (Windows x64 Portable Version)**

* CodexFlow-v0.3.0-win-x64-portable.zip
* CodexFlow-v0.3.0-win-x64-portable.7z

**Quick Start**

https://github.com/lulu-sk/CodexFlow/blob/master/README.zh-CN.md#-%E5%BF%AB%E9%80%9F%E5%BC%80%E5%A7%8B
